allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Tickety event discovery app

Features:
- Event discovery with featured carousel and upcoming events list
- Category and location filtering with chips UI
- Event creation with tags \(predefined + custom\)
- Admin dashboard with statistics and analytics
- Usher mode with ticket scanning \(hold-to-scan + continuous mode\)
- Profile, search, wallet, and tickets screens

Architecture:
- Clean architecture with feature-based organization
- Material Design 3 with system-aware theming
- Cross-platform: Android, iOS, Web, Windows, Linux, macOS

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
